pages.text: Legend tells of creatures in the sky whose drops could help a fledgeling engineer organize their items... For a complete guide to these rumors, craft the Cloud Storage and You book.
In order to craft this, however, you will need drops from the creatures that reside high in the sky.

What that book $(italics)doesn't$() mention, however, is that $(l:kinetic_machines/whisk)whisking$() together standard Clouds and Lightning Attractors gathers surrounding static electricity, resulting in a Static Cloud.$(br2)Note that both the Cloud Chest and Static Cloud chest can have up to 8,192 slots.
